document_data.History: The father of the would-be king [[Mertwig]] waged a bloody war with the Rhygn that lasted for two days and a single night, ending in the death of all the Rhygn people. Following this conflict, the Rhygn people were buried within [[Rhygn burial mounds|two great mounds]].
